Package accounts.bank.managing.thesis.bachelor.rastvdmy.controller

Class TransferController

java.lang.Object
accounts.bank.managing.thesis.bachelor.rastvdmy.controller.TransferController
@RestController @RequestMapping(path="/transfer") public class TransferController extends Object
This class is responsible for handling transfer related requests. It provides endpoints for getting all transfers, filtering transfers, getting a transfer by id or reference number, and creating a transfer.

  • Method Details

    • getTransfers

      @ResponseStatus(OK) @GetMapping(path="/") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_MODERATOR\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Transfer>> getTransfers()
      This method is used to get all transfers.
      Returns:
      A list of all transfers.

    • filterTransfers

      @ResponseStatus(OK) @GetMapping(path="/filter") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_MODERATOR\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Transfer>> filterTransfers(@RequestParam(value="page",defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(value="size",defaultValue="10") int size, @RequestParam(value="sort",defaultValue="asc") String sort)
      This method is used to filter transfers.
      Parameters:
      page - The page number.
      size - The size of the page.
      sort - The sort order.
      Returns:
      A page of filtered transfers.

    • getTransferById

      @ResponseStatus(OK) @GetMapping(path="/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_MODERATOR\', \'ROLE_USER\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Transfer> getTransferById(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      This method is used to get a transfer by id.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the transfer.
      Returns:
      The transfer with the given id.

    • getTransferByReferenceNumber

      @ResponseStatus(OK) @GetMapping(path="/reference") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_MODERATOR\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Transfer> getTransferByReferenceNumber(@RequestBody TransferRequest request)
      This method is used to get a transfer by reference number.
      Parameters:
      request - The request containing the reference number.
      Returns:
      The transfer with the given reference number.

    • createTransfer

      @ResponseStatus(CREATED) @PostMapping(path="/") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_MODERATOR\', \'ROLE_USER\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Transfer> createTransfer(@RequestBody TransferRequest transfer)
      This method is used to create a transfer.
      Parameters:
      transfer - The request containing the sender id, receiver card number, amount, and description.
      Returns:
      The created transfer.
